Translated by Google Translator

This application has unlocked 3000 Radio Stations.

Like most, it also integrates with iTunes, and you can play all your library for him. However, the VOX goes further, offering the ability to reproduce files ALAC (Apple Lossless Audio Codec), FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec), AAC (Advanced Audio Coding), OGG and of course MP3.

Other player's outstanding features include synchronization with Last.fm music service, support more than 3,000 online radio (unlocked via purchase within the app), automatic covers search albums by MusicBrainz and Last.fm, music control the Mac keyboard and the buttons on the headphones and remote control Apple covers of viewing the app icon itself (Dock), automatic pause when you disconnect a computer headset, support notifications and AirPlay, ability to play music stored network / external drives, among other things
